title.description: Used as a replacement name when displaying the set's name.

rarityMin.description: The minimum rarity the set can be. Must be smaller than or equal to rarityMax.

rarityMax.description: The maximum rarity the set can be. Must be larger than or equal to rarityMin.

flower.description: The name of the flower within the set.

plume.description: The name of the plume within the set.

sands.description: The name of the sands within the set.

goblet.description: The name of the goblet within the set.

circlet.description: The name of the circlet within the set.
